title: Restore scrolling within CoachProfileDetailModal content area

requirements.summary: Ensure the coach profile detail modal body scrolls vertically for overflowing content across Posts, Jobs, and Comments tabs without clipping.
acceptanceCriteria: When opening another coach’s profile modal, the content area scrolls vertically with mouse wheel/trackpad on desktop and swipe on mobile.
In the Posts tab, a long list of posts can be fully scrolled from top to bottom inside the modal.
In the Jobs tab, a long list of jobs can be fully scrolled from top to bottom inside the modal.
In the Comments tab, a long list of comments can be fully scrolled from top to bottom inside the modal.
The modal header area (name/avatar/follow buttons) remains visible while scrolling the modal body (or, if it scrolls away by design, scrolling still works reliably and content is not clipped).
Scrolling does not get “stuck” due to nested overflow containers (i.e., no combination of `overflow-hidden` + missing height prevents scrolling).

file_operations.description: Refactor the modal layout so the modal body (including Tabs content) is the sole vertical scroll container with a bounded height. Use a deterministic flex layout (e.g., header as flex-shrink-0, body as flex-1 with min-h-0) and apply overflow-y-auto (plus mobile-friendly touch scrolling) to the body region so Posts/Jobs/Comments lists can scroll fully without being clipped.

requirements.summary: Update CoachProfileDetailModal overflow strategy to use a deterministic-height scroll container compatible with shadcn Dialog, without modifying any ui components.
acceptanceCriteria: No edits are made to any `frontend/src/components/ui/*` files (they must be composed/used as-is).

The scrollable region is bounded (e.g., modal uses `max-h-[90vh]` and the body region scrolls within that bound) and does not rely on an element with `height: 100%` unless all parent heights are explicitly defined.
Regression check: the Job Board dialogs that already use `max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto` continue to scroll correctly.

file_operations.description: Adjust the modal container/scroll region composition to work reliably with shadcn Dialog by ensuring the scroll container has an explicit bound (retain max-h-[90vh]) and that the immediate flex child uses min-h-0 to allow scrolling. Avoid nested competing overflow regions (e.g., remove or constrain the current ScrollArea usage if it introduces nested overflow/height ambiguity) while keeping `frontend/src/components/ui/*` files unchanged.

Perform a regression-focused pass to confirm Job Board dialogs continue to use their existing bounded scrolling pattern (max-h-[90vh] with overflow-y-auto) and remain unaffected by the CoachProfileDetailModal scrolling changes. Keep behavior and user-facing text unchanged.
